name: Iniquitous Baptist
desc:
A monster from the Abyss that wields multiple types of Elemental Power and has gained extra limbs from its "evolution."

"The nature of the 'Abyss' is essentially irreconcilable with the elements. However, even the elements of gods can be entrapped and distorted before they are subsumed to become tools of the abyssal will. Just judging from outcomes and practical use, "Abyssal powers" seem little different from elemental items, from ones as paltry as the Treasure Hoarders' elemental containers to those as powerful as Visions..."
—Notes left behind in Hangeh Afrasiyab by someone.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Evergloom Ring
dropMaterial.desc:
A mystical weapon obtained after defeating the Four-Armed Envoy of dark tidings.

Rings are shaped like passageways, which is why arcane formations that are meant to produce some mystical effect are often ring-shaped. Such rings are perhaps gateways intended to guide the universe itself.

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
It should hold absolute control over this world."

dropMaterial.name: Vajrada Amethyst Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"This body is the noblest and most eminent of all in this world.
"It should hold absolute control over this world.
"It once promised its people a dream: the never-changing 'eternity.'"

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry..."
"...to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world."

dropMaterial.name: Shivada Jade Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"Sorry... to also have you shoulder the grievances of the world.
"Since you could endure my bitter cold, you must have the desire to burn?
"Then, burn away the old world for me."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods..."

dropMaterial.name: Varunada Lazurite Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"My ideals have no stains.
I must correct you. People here bear no sins in the eyes of the gods... Only laws and the Tribunal can judge someone.
They can judge even me. So praise my magnificence and purity."

customize.text: A creature of the Abyss Order that can manipulate multiple elements at once and use Wards of the corresponding elements to defend against damage. In battle, it will create Elemental Rings, through which it will channel a powerful attack. Use Reactions to destroy all the Rings to prevent the oncoming catastrophe.

<color=#ffd780>When You Say Nothing at All</color>
Destroy all Elemental Rings to paralyze the Iniquitous Baptist when it begins to channel its attack.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Despite the Barrier Between Us...</color>
Defeat the Iniquitous Baptist without destroying its Elemental Shield.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Proof by Exhaustion</color>
Defeat Iniquitous Baptists of all possible elemental combinations.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Presumption of Guilt</color>
Defeat the Iniquitous Baptist in Co-Op Mode.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.
